attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of injured ex service men under the age of 35 are having there housing benefit cut to shared room rate

Good news for Ex offenders though under 35 & people who have spent 3 months in a homeless hostel wont be cut.

I want the government to reconsider this with Immediate effect. To discuss this issue open and publicly

With anyone leaving the armed forces indefinite one bedroom rate no shared rate..

Its rather funny that we fight for other peoples freedoms but not our own.

Please show your for hero's by signing this e-petition.
